tasks.title: Generate remaining JSON Schemas for OFSCP spec (v0.1)
tasks.description: Continue generating JSON Schemas for OFSCP spec models beyond provider discovery: user profile, presence, privacy, groups/channels, messages, paging envelope, errors, and any other payloads described in docs/ofscp_spec.md. Add samples + AJV validation tests. Update KB with schema structure and how to validate.

tasks.title: Generate official JSON Schemas for the OFSCP spec
tasks.description: Examine the OFSCP specification in this repo and generate JSON Schema files for official hosting. Include schema structure, ids, versioning, and validation tests.

tasks.title: Spec: restrict identifiers to URI-based option; update references to ids
tasks.description: Update OFSCP spec sections 2.2 and 2.4 to allow only URI-based identifiers; scan remaining doc for outdated references to other id forms and update accordingly.

tasks.title: Reorganize OFSCP spec: move 5.1.3 into privacy endpoints section and renumber 5.1A into its own numbered section
tasks.description: User requested spec restructuring: 5.1.3 (Visibility policy) should live within the privacy endpoints section, and section 5.1A should be moved out so it has its own top-level number (not nested awkwardly under 5.1). Implement by moving/renumbering relevant sections in docs/ofscp_spec.md and ensuring internal references remain consistent.

tasks.title: Design presence/bio/group privacy model + endpoints for OFSCP user profile
tasks.description: User wants users to control privacy of presence, group membership, and bio. Propose endpoint model, data shapes, authz rules, and how federation/lookup behaves. Update docs/ofscp_spec.md accordingly after design is agreed.

tasks.title: Second pass: apply full normalization + remaining OFSCP spec improvements to docs/ofscp_spec.md
tasks.description: User reported prior edits didn't go through. Re-apply full set of suggestions: normalize metadata types, pagination cursor semantics, reaction schema, identity privacy/public-private split, SSE resume, RFC7807 errors, federation request auth details, discoverability tier standards and mapping, identifier standards, etc. Ensure changes persist and verify by rereading file.

tasks.title: Second pass: normalize OFSCP spec inconsistencies (metadata types, cursors, identifiers, SSE resume, error format, privacy/user model)
tasks.description: Apply remaining recommendations to docs/ofscp_spec.md: normalize metadata to one shape, fix cursor examples to opaque cursors, clarify identifiers (URI vs id/home), tighten SSE (event ids + Last-Event-ID), standardize errors (RFC7807), split public vs private user fields guidance, reaction schema cleanup, and align tiers/capabilities semantics. Update KB accordingly.

tasks.title: Apply interoperability/security/versioning fixes to docs/ofscp_spec.md
tasks.description: Incorporate prior review suggestions into docs/ofscp_spec.md: define versioning/compat rules, canonical identifiers & data formats, standard request signing + key rotation + replay prevention, SSE resume semantics, metadata consistency, error format guidance. Update/align KB article if needed.

tasks.title: Feedback on docs/ofscp_spec.md
tasks.description: Review the OFSCP specification for holes, oversights, improvements, simpler implementations, and recommendations for standards. Do not modify the file.
